name: Dashboard Monitor
description: Real-time monitoring dashboard for the tourist scheduling system. Provides WebSocket-based live updates, network topology visualization, and system metrics. Built with Google ADK.

skills.name: Get Dashboard Summary
skills.description: Returns comprehensive dashboard state including tourists, guides, assignments, and computed metrics like utilization rates and satisfaction scores.
examples: What are the current system metrics?

skills.name: Get Recent Events
skills.description: Returns the most recent communication events in the system, useful for activity monitoring and debugging.
examples: What happened in the last 10 minutes?

skills.name: Network Topology
skills.description: Provides agent network topology data showing connections between scheduler, guides, tourists, and UI agents.
